column4: my mic has stopped working in Karmic Koala, I tested it on another system running Karmic Koala and it was working properly, what could be the reason ?
i'd guess it's a configuration issue... did you play around with sound settings?
yes I did, and I remember I did not change any settings
open the sound settings, go to hardware and tell me which profile you're running
that's the problem.. switch to analog stereo duplex, then click on the input tab, speak into the mike and see if the indicator will show anything
no idea.. you or someone else may have changed it by accident or it could have been an upgrade glitch
in any case i'm glad to be of some assistance for a change :D
my skype has stopped working now :-( I mean no sound
usually you just have to config it.. i think i also had to the first time around.. im opening mine
go into options and go to sound
tell me if anything (mic/speakers/ring) are NOT "PulseAudio server (local)"
a restart worked now :-) I mean restarting Skype
ahhh ok.. i think it does need to be restarted to play nice with changed osund settings.. no worries and enjoy :)
